item.title: Mastodon: Toot instead of Publish
item.description: Overwrites Mastodon’s V4 “Publish!” button to “Toot!” using CSS div.compose-form__publish-button-wrapper > button, div.ui__header__links > a[href="/publish"] { text-indent: -9999px; line-height: 0; } div.compose-form__publish-button-wrapper > button::after, div.ui__header__links > a[href="/publish"]::after { content: "Toot!"; text-indent: 0; display: block; line-height: initial; }
